text: Jonathan Benjamin Gill (born 7 December 1986) is an English actor, farmer, presenter, singer, songwriter. He is best known as a member of the boy band JLS, who came second on The X Factor in 2008. They had five number-one singles and sold over 10 million records worldwide before disbanding in December 2013. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London
title: JB Gill
